content: meet grace the note she d make the perfect gift for any music teacher or music student she d also make a great keychain or christmas ornament and i think she d look pretty cute in a variety of colors this very easy pdf crochet pattern is only 5 pages long including step-by-step photos to help you along the way pattern is written in u s terminology and only available in english difficulty easy you will only need basic crocheting skills to make this pattern -single_crochet -slip_stitch -double_crochet -half_double_crochet -single_crochet increase -invisible decrease -basic sewing skills to assemble all the parts together materials you will need -size f 3 75mm crochet hook -worsted weight yarn -fiberfill or your stuffing of choice -7 5mm black safety eyes -stitch marker -yarn needle -scissors
